A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I am taken aback about what issues people had with this movie. It is an overall excellent film I thought. It was fun and engaging and felt like a live version of a episode of the Star Wars Rebels cartoon in a way. I think people were looking for a twist like Empire Strikes Back had in it. In a way\, it did but it was bold in that it made it feel like less of a soap opera and more like a real universe. Haters gonna hate I guess\, but I think people should see this one.
